name: Vote on renaming Slack channels
description: When a channel is renamed in Slack, revert the change and perform a vote. If the vote passes, execute the rename.
check:
yes_votes = proposal.get_yes_votes().count()
no_votes = proposal.get_no_votes().count()
logger.debug(f"{yes_votes} for, {no_votes} against")
if yes_votes >= 1:
  return PASSED
elif no_votes >= 1:
  return FAILED

logger.debug("No votes yet....")
return PROPOSED
notify:
message = f"Should this channel be renamed to #{action.name}? Vote with :thumbsup: or :thumbsdown: on this post."
slack.initiate_vote(proposal, template=message)
success:
text = f"Proposal to rename this channel to #{action.name} passed."
slack.post_message(text=text, channel=action.channel, thread_ts=proposal.community_post)
action.execute()
fail:
text = f"Proposal to rename this channel to #{action.name} failed."
slack.post_message(text=text, channel=action.channel, thread_ts=proposal.community_post)
